section: EXT_INT_Config.h Drivers/MCAL/ExtInt/EXT_INT_Config.h Go to the documentation of this file.1 23 #ifndef EXT_INT_CONFIG_H_ 24 #define EXT_INT_CONFIG_H_ 25 26 34 #define EXT_INT0_STATE EXT_INT_ENABLE 35 43 #define EXT_INT1_STATE EXT_INT_ENABLE 44 53 #define EXT_INT2_STATE EXT_INT_ENABLE 54 55 56 57 /* sense control 58 values = { 59 EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_LOW_LEVEL, => Int0, 1 60 EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_ANY_CHANGE, => Int0, 1 61 EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_FALLING_EDGE, => Int0, 1, 2 62 EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_RISING_EDGE => Int0, 1, 2 63 } 64 */ 65 66 67 #if EXT_INT0_STATE == EXT_INT_ENABLE 78 #define EXT_INT0_SENSE_CTRL EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_FALLING_EDGE 79 #endif 80 81 #if EXT_INT1_STATE == EXT_INT_ENABLE 92 #define EXT_INT1_SENSE_CTRL EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_FALLING_EDGE 93 #endif 94 95 #if EXT_INT2_STATE == EXT_INT_ENABLE 104 #define EXT_INT2_SENSE_CTRL EXT_INT_SENSE_CONTROL_FALLING_EDGE 105 #endif 106 107 108 #endif /* EXT_INT_CONFIG_H_ */
